DataVariant.title: Image
DataVariant.Description: All data objects of the variant Image implement the interface stromx::Image. Images are two-dimensional arrays with 1-3 channels and 8-bit or 16-bit pixels.

DataVariant.title: Mono image 8-bit
DataVariant.Description: Image with one channel and 8-bit pixels.

Operator.Description: This operators convolutes the input image with a Gaussian kernel of a given width. The operator can operate in-place.

Parameter.title: In place
Parameter.Description: If true the operator is initialized with only one input and the image at this input is blurred in-place. Otherwise, the operator is initialized with an input and a destination input.

Parameter.title: Kernel size
Parameter.Description: The size of the Gaussian kernel.

Input.title: Source
Input.Description: The input image. If the operator is initialized as an in-place operation this image will be blurred.

Input.title: Destination
Input.Description: The image which will contain the blurred version of the image Source.

Output.title: Result
Output.Description: The the blurred image. This is either the destination image (no in-place operation) or the input image (in-place operation).
